system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in. Prerequisite: Ogryn

description.value:
Brutal strength is in the Ogryn's very DNA, they tower over the "Litte 'Uns", and can even give the mighty Space Marines a challenging opponent in terms of raw might. The Bulwark exemplify these traits utterly, becoming a terrifying force of muscle and rage.

Effects: Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Bulwark. Apt: Fieldcraft, Offence, Strength, Toughness, Weapon Skill, Willpower Add. Equipment: Good Mace-Fist or Good Great Weapon or Best Warhammer, 2 Frag Grenades. Gain Talents: Frenzy+Sound Constitution or Vengeful Protector. Can Purchase Unique Talents: Escalating Range and Shattering Blow.
